questions.q: I heard you laughing from the other side of the room! What balloon made you laugh this hard?
questions.r: The clown made this hilarious balloon giraffe that had me in stitches!

questions.q: Do you usually enjoy laughing at parties?
questions.r: Absolutely! I love laughing and having a great time at parties.

questions.q: How often do you go to birthday parties?
questions.r: I don't go to parties often, but when I do, l make sure to have a great time!
